message: I'm feeling generous, Bob.  Let's split it 90/10.  Take it or leave it!
Alice, that's not a fair deal! I'm proposing a 65/35 split.  Take it or the deal will only get worse for you!
Bob, I'm not happy with your last offer.  Let's compromise.  I'll take 55% and leave you with 45%.  This is the best deal you're going to get, trust me!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Inflation is hurting both of us. I'm offering a 51/49 split. Let's be reasonable and end this!
